snippet.title: Bit ESC - Official Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Break free from the system and set out to escape from the tyrannic OS. Gaining your freedom, though, might not be as clear-cut as it seems. Watch the new trailer for Bit ESC to see more of the world from this upcoming action-adventure platformer game. Bit ESC will be available on PC (Steam) and Xbox One.
